domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump Use the same logic in the case of high crime stats that you use to fight high COVID cases. Large police forces gather more data simply due to the size of the manpower to do so. Contact tracing and more testing produces more positive Coronavirus results. #DefundThePolice
